meanings.sent1: She is the slenderer of the two sisters.
meanings.sent2: The model had a slenderer figure than the actress.
meanings.sent3: The slenderer tree swayed gracefully in the wind.
meanings.sent4: Her slenderer fingers delicately held the fragile glass.
meanings.sent5: The slenderer shape of the vase made it look more elegant.

meanings.definition: One who or that which makes slender.
meanings.sent1: The personal trainer was a skilled slenderer.
meanings.sent2: The corset was considered a historical slenderer.
meanings.sent3: The salad spinner was jokingly called the salad slenderer.
meanings.sent4: The tailor was known as a master slenderer of clothes.
meanings.sent5: The yoga instructor was a gentle but effective slenderer of bodies.
